tokens.resolved_gloss: to call out to (i.e. properly, address by name, but used in a wide variety of applications)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce
tokens.translation: properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce

tokens.resolved_gloss: desire (and so probably in Proverbs 31:4); hence (by way of alternative) or, also if
tokens.translation: desire (and so probably in Proverbs 31:4); hence (by way of alternative) or, also if

tokens.resolved_gloss: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
tokens.translation: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue

tokens.resolved_gloss: to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again
